1.name: The muddy sewer
desc: You are standing in mud to your knees. This is not the kind of place
for a picnic. The muddy sewer stretches further into the south.
It seems you were right it wont be possible to get back up this way.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

2.name: The muddy sewer junction
desc: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the south. It looks as if
no person has ever sat his foot here before. It's too muddy for that
anyway. The sewer leads north, south and east from here.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the north.
East. The muddy sewer leads into a bend that goes south.
South. The muddy sewer ends in a mudhole that way.

3.name: The mudhole
desc: You stand in mud all the way up to your thighs and it's not too
comfortable since you are used to a somewhat different environment.
The sewer leads to the north of here. In the middle you can just make
out an enormous drainpipe leading down.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: North. The muddy junction lies in that direction.
The muddy drainpipe leads down through the mud, otherwise it is utterly dark.

4.name: The Dark Pit
desc: You are standing by the edge of a dark pit that leads down into even
deeper darkness. >BWWAAADDRR< - The smell from down there is unbearable.
The sewer stretches into the darkness to the east.

exits.desc: East. The sewer leads into the sewer junction.

desc: The Dark Pit leads down an down and down ... well you can't see the
bottom anyway. There are bars that function as a ladder on the side.

5.name: The muddy sewer
desc: You are standing in the middle of a bend of the sewer pipe. It is very
dark around here and the mud is sticking to your legs, not very pleasant.
The pipe leads east and south from here.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: East. The mud stretches on into the darkness.

desc: South. There is even more mud in that direction than where you are now.
Incredible.

6.name: The muddy sewer
desc: You are standing in something that reminds you very much of porridge, this
has the advantage that it's not hot, it's rather cold actually. The pipe
bends to the north and east.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: The muddy sewer pipe leads into a bend that goes east.

desc: The pipe leads into a bend that goes south. Interesting, there's mud on the
floor there.

7.name: The muddy sewer bend
desc: This isn't your idea of a place to stay too long. You're in up to your
knees in something that resembles mud, but you're not quite sure. The
bend in which you stand leads west and south.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
The pipe leads into a intersection that goes south and east. The floor here
is still covered in mud.
The pipe (still filled with mud) leads into a intersection that goes north
and south. Interesting.

8.name: A muddy intersection
desc: You have both your feet safely stuck in mud. It isn't the mud that's wrong
it's the smell, the sounds, the total darkness that surrounds you. Everything
here is so depressing. The pipe leads on with a trail of thick mud to the
north, east and south.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
North. The pipe goes into a bend with a load of mud all the way up the walls.
The bend leads west.
East. This way like a place for the annual mud festival, although the stench
wouldn't allow any happiness at all. The pipe leads into a bend that leads
north.
South. There's less mud in that direction. *smile*. Your light doesn't
cover enough space for you to see much more than that it leads into some
sort of junction.

9.name: The Sewer Junction
desc: You stand in the middle of a huge junction of sewer pipes right under
what you'd think was an air shaft. The sewer pipes lead to the north,
south, east and west. It look quite impossible to force your way up.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: North. Mud is the floor basis in that direction. Yummy.
YYEEUUCH! BOOH! THAT looks like a nice place for creepy crawlies.

desc: North. This direction looks quite nice actually. The pipe leads into
a bend that goes east.
A few yards ahead - away from this junction - there is a pit leading down,
but the smell from there...>PHEWW<.

10.name: A bend in sewer pipe
desc: You are in a bend in the sewer pipe. A strong smell seeps in from the north.
The sewer goes north and east.

exits.desc: North. You are staring into a huge junction with exits in all directions.
East. The Pipe leads into utter darkness that way.

11.name: The muddy sewer pipe
desc: You have entered a kind of tube intersection that leads south, west and east.
Your legs are covered in mud up to the knees. REAL yucky!
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: East. There's less mud in that direction, or that's your impression.

desc: That way is lost in darkness, though you sense less mud in that direction,
perhaps even a complete end to this sludge that surrounds you.

exits.desc: West. The mud reaches that way too, all the way up the walls.

12.name: The bend in the Muddy sewer
desc: This is not your idea of a holiday. You stand in mud up to your knees.
It's absolutely inconceivable how all this mud could have been placed
here. The pipe leads to the west and south.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
South. There's even more mud that way, incredible! Although it looks
like an intersection in the sewer system that leads east and south.
West. All you can see, is that the pipe leads into a bend that goes
north. But there's less mud in that direction, however odd that sounds.

13.name: A MUDDY intersection
desc: You wouldn't want to know the true feeling of standing in this mud up to
your hips. >BWAADR<. All that fills your mind right now is the dream of
a hot bath. This is NOT very clean mud you know, remember you're in the
sewer! The pipes leads north, south and east.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
It's NOT the kind of matter that would concern you too much, normally, but
as you are in the middle of it, it just might become your main concern.
REAL YUCKY!
North. Sludge and sediment fills this corridor of the sewer that leads
into a bend going west.
East. You can see absolutely nothing of interest in that direction (Maybe
that's why it's so damn interesting.??) There's no mud in that direction
either, GREAT!
South. All you can see is more mud! Although the pipe goes into a bend
leading west.

14.name: Muddy sewer
desc: You stand in a bend of the pipe system of the sewer with mud up to your
thighs. Contemplating a higher level of existence here would be utterly
inappropriate, as the smell would keep any intelligent creature from even
thinking of anything but getting away from this foul end of the WORLD.
The bend goes from north to west.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
North. Filled with mud, that place looks like an impassable intersection
with pipes leading north and east.
West. There's less mud that way, maybe you're on your way out of this foul
place.

15.name: The old well
desc: You are standing by an old and worn well from before this century. The sewer
leads to the east from here and the well leads down into darkness. Metal
bars implanted in the side of the well lead down as a ladder.
These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe, but perhaps safe
enough for you to climb down, WITH both hands on them.
East. You see, because of the utter darkness that surround you, absolutely
nothing. Your light isn't of much use for that kind of distance.
Down the well there's even less light than up here, so ... sorry, you can't
see a thing. There are metal bars in the side leading down into the darkness.

16.name: The ordinary bend
desc: You are in the middle of a bend in the pipe system of the sewer system,
WHAT a place!!! The pipe leads to the south and the east.
East. What a quiet place you've found there. It's an intersection that have
pipeways going north and east.

exits.desc: South. You see nothing at all in that direction it's too dark anyway.

17.name: The sewer junction
17.desc: You are in a junction that leads north, west and south.

exits.desc: North. You see a bend.

desc: South. It looks like a pipe junction just like this one. Only that one
leads east and west.

exits.desc: West. There's a junction with four pipelines in that direction.

18.name: The ordinary junction
desc: This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet
here. The pipelines lead west, east and north.

exits.desc: To the north you can see a junction like this one, leading north and west.

desc: To the east there's nothing of particular interest, though there's a
junction with pipelines leading norht and east.

exits.desc: There's a bend to the west leading north.

21.name: A quiet pipe junction
desc: This is the kind of place to rest, though the smell could be a LOT better
than this. The sewer goes east, north and west from here.

exits.desc: In that direction, you can't see anything. It's just too dark.
There's an ordinary junction in the pipe system to the east

desc: West. There's an ordinary bend leading south into the sewer system in
that direction.

22.name: The odd room with smooth walls
desc: As you enter you hear a loud click from one of the walls ... and you fall
and fall and fall ...
... And come to an abrupt end. THIS is strange indeed. There's an arched
entryway leading down.

24.name: The sewer
desc: You are standing in mud up to your ankles. This is an intersection with
sewer pipes leading east, south and west.

exits.desc: To the east there's a peculiar looking round room.
To the south there's another intersection with pipes going south and east.

desc: To the west there's another intersection like this one, with sewer pipes
leading south and west.

25.name: Another intersection
desc: You have never seen anything so BORING...This is an intersection with pipes
leading north, south and east.
To the north there's an intersection, where the pipes are leading west and
east. You notice that the floor to the west is covered in mud.
East. You see nothing of interest in that direction, just another
intersection. This one leads east and south.

exits.desc: Another intersection lies to the south. It leads west and south.

26.name: A junction
desc: This one seems interesting, a big difference from all the other junctions.
It seems cleaner than the rest of them. Weird. Something that looks like
an air shaft leads upwards, but it looks far too slippery to climb.
The pipes lead to the south, west and north.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

exits.desc: North. You see an intersection there, leading north and east.
To the south there's ANOTHER junction leading west and east.

desc: To the west you see a load of mud and sediment in the sewer. That should
be an intersection there but you're not quite sure.

28.name: The sewer junction
28.desc: You stand in a junction of sewer pipes leading north, east and west.

exits.desc: To the east you can see a bend in the pipe going south.
To the west you can just make out an old well.

29.name: The Triple Junction
desc: You stand in the middle of a huge junction of concrete sewer pipes. The
pipes lead into three different directions : east, south and west.

exits.desc: East. You can see a bend in the sewer pipe leading north.

desc: To the south there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.
To the west you can just make out another junction similar to the one
you are standing in.

30.name: The Quadruple Junction Under the Warehouse
desc: You are standing in something that reminds you of an entry to an ant hive.
There are enormous concrete pipes leading north, south, east and west.
There's also a metal ladder built into the concrete wall leading up.
It looks as if it's made of stainless steel, and it would very well function
as a club of considerable power, but alas ... You can't take at all since
it's firmly set into the concrete wall.
To the north you can see a huge triple junction with sewer pipes leading
west and east.

exits.desc: East. You can see a pit in the floor.
To the south there's a huge junction with pipes leading east and west.
To the west there's an odd looking room with totally smooth walls.
You see a grate

31.name: A triple junction
31.desc: You stand in a junction with pipes leading west, north and east.

desc: To the north there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.

exits.desc: East. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and east.
West. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

34.name: A bend in the sewer pipe
34.desc: You can look in two directions where the pipe leads : south and west.

exits.desc: To the south you can see another bend leading west.
West. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

35.name: The sewer pipe bend
desc: You can look in two different directions where the pipe goes : west and
north.

exits.desc: North. You see another bend leading west.

desc: You can see another junction although this one is a triple one with pipes
going south and west.

36.name: The pit
desc: You stand in a section of a pipe that leads to a dead end. In the floor
there's a pit leading down. There are bars set in the side of the pit wall
functioning as a ladder.

exits.desc: West. You can see a dimly lit quadruple junction with an exit up.
Down the pit it's utterly dark you can't see a thing.

37.name: The round room
desc: As you enter the room it starts rotating - at first slowly, later faster
and faster - You get totally confused as to where up and down is, but you are
certain that the doorway is in the opposite direction of what it was when
you entered. It now leads east. There was only this one exit.

38.name: The three way junction
38.desc: You are standing in a junction of pipes that lead west, east and south.

exits.desc: East. You can make out a dimly lit Guard Room.
To the south you can see what looks like a store room.
West. You see another junction similar to this one leading north and south.

39.name: The Sewer Store Room
desc: You stand in a small room lit by a single torch set in the wall. The only
way out of here is to the north.

41.name: The Shaft
desc: You are standing by the edge of a deep, dark shaft leading down. A single
ladder is your tool to work your way down if you so wish. The sewer pipe
leads south from here.
Firmly set into the wall of the shaft it's impossible to even rock, is your
estimate.

exits.desc: To the south you can see the pipe leading further south into darkness.

desc: Down and utter darkness. There's absolutely nothing to be seen in that
direction.

43.name: The Sewer Entrance
desc: You stand in the middle of a pipe that leads from north to south. Above you
an air shaft leads up into sunlight. It seems totally impossible to go up
that way.

exits.desc: To the north you can just make out a huge shaft leading down.
To the south you can see a triple junction leading west and east.

44.name: The junction going three ways
desc: You are in a passageway in the pipes of the sewer system leading north, east
and west.

exits.desc: You see a sewer pipe leading north.

desc: West. You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.

45.name: The Sewer Room
desc: You are standing in a large room with chairs set in the walls. You have the
feeling of being watched. To the south there's an entry to a larger room.
The room is lit by five torches, also set in the walls. To the west there
is a doorway leading out to the sewers.

exits.desc: You can see an even larger room than this one, filled with light.
To the west you can see the sewers.

46.name: The Sewer room
desc: This is a Room with walls that glitters like gold though not quite like it.
This is strange as it looks as if the glitter lights the whole room. It
looks very bright. To the south the floor is covered with yucky water. The
North leads to sort of a Guard Room.

exits.desc: To the north you can see the guard room.
To the south there is nothing but water and an exit leads east from there.

47.name: The Pool in the sewer
desc: You stand in water to your waste. To the north is the entrance to this room.
A single door leads east.

exits.desc: To the north you see the entrance to this room.
You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.

48.name: The Sewers
desc: You stand in a dead end of the sewer. The only way out is south.
You can see a shaft leading up but it looks too difficult to go up
that way.

49.name: The junction
49.desc: You stand in a junction leading north, west and east.

desc: Darkness has closed in on that part of the sewer system, you can't see
a thing in that direction.
West. You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.

50.name: The small room
desc: The only thing in this room of interest is a chair, and that's tight to the
rock floor. A doorway leads south and another leads east into darkness.

exits.desc: Utter darkness...!
You can see a room with a lot of light in it. You can't make out any details.

51.name: The Sewer pipe
desc: You are in what reminds you of a foul sewer, as if you liked being here!
You can see two exits leading either north or south.

exits.desc: To the south you can see a strange light flowing from there.

52.name: The Grand Sewer
desc: You are in a Grand Sewer Pipe. This stretches toward the south. It's large
indeed! A doorway leads to the east from here.

exits.desc: To the north you can see a doorway.
You can't see anything in that darkness.
In the south end of the pipe the "floor" is completely covered with water.

53.name: The South end of the Grand Pipe
desc: You stand in water to your knees. A doorway leads west from here. The Pipe
stretches north.

exits.desc: You see a lot of pictures decorating the walls.

55.name: The Edge of The Water Sewer
desc: You stand in a room where half of the floor is covered in water. The water
leads east and a doorway leads west.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can hardly make out much more than that the next place is in a pipe
with more water.

56.name: The Dark hallway
desc: You can't see much of this, even with a light. The hallway goes into a
passageway to the south. A dorway leads west.

exits.desc: You can see nothing at all, because it's completely dark in that direction.
You see a lot of light, bright as daylight, but nothing of interest.

57.name: The dark passageway
desc: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

58.name: The dark passageway
desc: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

59.name: The dark passageway
desc: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

60.name: The dark passageway
desc: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue west and north. To the east there's water
covering the floor and that leads through an arched entry to a watery
sewer.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

exits.desc: You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

61.name: The Watery Sewer Bend
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to bend and lead south and west.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

62.name: The Watery sewer
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

63.name: The Watery sewer
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

64.name: The Watery Sewer Junction
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead into a junction going south,north and east.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

65.name: The Watery sewer
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

66.name: The Watery sewer junction
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead into a junction that goes north,south and east.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

67.name: The Watery sewer
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

68.name: The Watery sewer bend
desc: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to bend and lead west and north.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

desc: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

69.name: A ledge by the dark pool
desc: You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop
down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops,
like a waterfall, into the pool far down.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

exits.desc: You can't see a thing. It's too dark.
You can't see a thing. It's too dark.

70.name: A ledge by the dark pool
desc: You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop
down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops,
like a waterfall, into the pool far down. Under you there is a small fissure
in the rock. It seems big enough to contain a few people.

extra.desc: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

exits.desc: You can't see a thing. It's too dark.
You can't see a thing. It's too dark.

99.name: The fissure under the ledge
desc: This is a small fissure in the solid rock. Under you lies the deep dark pool.
The water trickles quietly down from the ledge above you. The water smells
like the water in a sewer.

exits.desc: The water edge.
